    Starting Personal Blog

    less than 1 minute read

    So here it begins!

    After long slackness and hiatus of 2 years or so, I am restarting my personal blog! This can serve as good learning experience as well as motiviating myself to learn more and consolidate my learnings.

    Contents

    I will mostly talk about data science, travel, sports via data, and stuffs related to my love for nifty gadgets.

    Tech Stack

    I purchased Samsung Chromebook 3

    just for the purpose of this blog. Iâ€™ve installed xfce so that I can develop things in Linux environment. For $200, I now have solid 11 inch and 12 hour lasting perfect scripting toy!

    So my Windows desktop is of great entertainment value, but is not suitable for development. My Macbook Pro is bulky, and does not have the best battery life - it is a over-overkill for simple scripting tasks.

    Following things are used to power this website!

    • Jekyll
    • Minimal Mistakes
    • Jekyll Crosspost to Medium

    So finally, like Tiger Woods said :

    I guess, hello world!
